snippet: Largely excluded from the economic recovery, carpenters, electricians, plumbers and other construction workers are pleading for work on the online classified advertising site.
abstract: Carpenters, electricians, plumbers and other construction workers, largely excluded from the economic recovery, are advertising for work on the online classified advertising site Craigslist; builders are not hiring, homeowners are deferring renovations and governments are postponing highway and bridge projects, leaving few options; economists are forecasting that the nation’s employers added about 165,000 net jobs last month, but few of them are in the construction industry.
lead_paragraph: Largely excluded from the economic recovery, carpenters, electricians, plumbers and other construction workers are pleading for work on the online classified advertising site.
